main.name: Aanya Jain
main.description: I am an App development engineer and I use React Native to develop pages.I love to recreate experiences and make new ones.I am a Designer by heart and Developer by choice.
main.bio: I am good at React Native and designing the websites and apps using Figma.I have done my BTECH from Vellore Institute of Technology,Chennai.My life mission is to make my parents proud of me and I should be proud of myself by achieving the good things in my life.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I loved going to colege as it was fun and had lots of activites, I didnt like the theory classes though but I liked the Projects as I could work with so many new students and learn a lot from them
I enjoyed going to scholl also,there was hardly a day I missed going.It was mainly as I had a nice group of friends with whom everythinh seemed easy.I wish I could go back there.

work.title: UI/UX Designer
work.description: I worked as a Designer for designing the apps and website screen for all device sizes using tools like Figma,Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator

work.title: Face Recognition with mask using MTCNN and FaceNet
work.description: Developed a system for recognising who the person wearing mask  is in the post-covid period using MTCNN and FaceNet models along with other classification techniques.

projects.title: Face Recognition with mask using MTCNN and FaceNet
